dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 5787 IH: Veterans HSA Access Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Carey (for himself, Mr. Golden of Maine, Mr. Kelly of Pennsylvania, Mr. Feenstra, and Ms. Malliotakis) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow, without regard to disability, individuals eligible for veterans benefits to contribute to health savings accounts.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Veterans HSA Access Act of 2023.

section.header: Individuals without service-connected disability and eligible for certain veterans benefits permitted to contribute to health savings accounts

subsection.text: Section 223(c)(1)(C) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking for a service-connected disability (within the meaning of section 101(16) of title 38, United States Code).
The amendment made by this section shall apply to taxable years beginning after December 31, 2025.
